price: Sε anka wͻ’regye Nyankopͻn ne Da a edi akyire no adi, ayi deε Nyankopͻn de ama wͻn no mu bi ama (wͻ Nyame kwan so) a, anka deεn na εbεyε wͻn? Nyankopͻn ne Onimdefoͻ a Onim wͻn yie paa.
arabic: وَمَاذَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ لَوۡ ءَامَنُواْ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلۡيَوۡمِ ٱلۡأٓخِرِ وَأَنفَقُواْ مِمَّا رَزَقَهُمُ ٱللَّهُۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ بِهِمۡ عَلِيمًا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wamādhā ʿalayhim law āmanū bil-lahi wal-yawmi al-ākhiri wa-anfaqū mimmā razaqahumu al-lahu wakāna al-lahu bihim ʿalīman
